algorithm_technique: Iterate through strings simultaneously, finding the longest common prefix from the left.
problem_summary_simple: Find minimum deletions to make three strings equal by removing from the right.
problem_summary_technical: Find the longest common prefix of the three strings; deletions are based on lengths minus prefix length.
key_insights: The operation only allows removing from the right, so the common part must be a prefix.
The problem reduces to finding the longest common prefix among the three strings.
If no common prefix exists (i=0), it's impossible to make them equal.
